import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const UnitDboard = () => { const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('dashboard'); const [chartAnimation, setChartAnimation] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { setChartAnimation(true); }, []); // Static data for the dashboard const dashboardData = { total: 1000, years: [ { year: '2021', value: 300, percentage: 30 }, { year: '2022', value: 500, percentage: 50 }, { year: '2023', value: 200, percentage: 20 } ], chartPath1: 'M 0 140 L 100 120 L 200 100 L 300 80 L 400 60 L 500 70 L 600 50 L 700 40 L 800 30 L 800 160 L 0 160 Z', chartPath2: 'M 0 120 L 100 100 L 200 80 L 300 90 L 400 70 L 500 85 L 600 75 L 700 65 L 800 60 L 800 160 L 0 160 Z' }; return (
{/* Sidebar */}
{/* Logo/Header */}

BloomNode

Unit Dashboard

{/* User Info */}
U

User Name

Unit Member

{/* Navigation */}
{/* Navigation items removed */}
{/* Logout Button */}
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Header */}

Unit Dashboard

Welcome to your unit dashboard

Good Morning

{new Date().toLocaleDateString()}

{/* Dashboard Content */}
{activeSection === 'dashboard' && (
{/* Sales Chart Section with Goal Completion */}
{/* Chart Section */}
{/* Chart */}
{/* Legend */}
Primary Data
Secondary Data
{/* Goal Completion Section */}

Goal Completion

{dashboardData.total}
Total Units Completed
75% of Annual Goal
)}
); }; export default UnitDboard;
